markings: Numbered in black on top of each base section and on bottom of each ceramic piece.
medium: Glazed ceramic, plywood, particle board, and wood
signed: On bottom of each ceramic piece and on one leg of stools, in black: Tetsuya Yamada / 2007
text: Seven white oblong ceramic statues stand next to one another and evenly spaced apart. Each statue rests on top of diamond-shaped plywood, and three rest on stools to make them all the same height. Each statue is slightly different in shape.
title: Morices
